item.title: Convert Seurat to Scanpy h5ad
item.author: Author
item.description: MuDataSeurat and sceasy are recommended MuDataSeurat Recommended!!! MuDataSeurat directly writes h5ad file without requiring Python runtime. All dependencies exist in R and can be easily installed and used. Refer to MuDataSeurat Install I have added some extra features. Please Install my fork which works for anndata >=0.8 and Seurat V5.
